to.label: To
to.help: Email address or addresses of the recipient/s (separated by comma).

cc.label: CC
cc.help: (Optional) CC email address or addresses (separated by comma).

bcc.label: BCC
bcc.help: (Optional) BCC email address or addresses (separated by comma).

body.label: Body
body.help: (Optional) Default email body that will be appended with the data. Can be HTML.
